Package ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.AssetTrading

Class OfferData

java.lang.Object
ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.AssetTrading.OfferData
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuyOfferData, SellOfferData
public abstract class OfferData
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class for BuyOfferData and SellOfferData Describes and implements methods related to inserting and retrieving offers, and manipulating retrieved offer data

      Return a string of an organisational unit's offers based.

      Returns:
      String of offers

      Returns:

      public void updateOfferQuantity​(int quantity, int ID)
      Given a quantity and offer, edit the offer's quantity by that amount
      Parameters:
      quantity - is the amount you want to change the offer by
      ID - is the ID of the offer you want to change the quantity of

      Checks if two strings are the same organisational unit name

      true if they are the same name, otherwise false
